title: I Got Hacked (Perma Banned) Please HELP
body:
Okay so I havent been on League of Legends for 5 weeks and in those 5 weeks i recently tried to log into my account. And when i did log in I found my account had been perma banned and as you would know i was so surprised about this because i did not give my password to anyone and it has made me very sad Ive been using this account for 1 whole year now and I have spent alot of money on it so I would like to ask for help please because this is very stressful for me as I have spent a lot of time on this game to be banned for some stupid stuff like this and I have left a Chat Log below of what they have said on my account to get it banned please share this to help justify who ever did this actions thanks you.

replies.body: You either handed out your account to some 1 to boost, or some one you know know your PW. I checked stat and history, this person or you. Played on the account everyday. Riot can do an IP check from the 5 weeks you havent played.
okay so what do i do till then?
Create a new account. Seriously though, this case of hack is entirely on you, you shared account am pretty sure.
There is a chance you can appeal this.[ Send in a ticket to Riot support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and explain to them what has happened.
Okay thank you. Finally someone who has actually tried to help me and answered my question.

I don't think Riot will consider taking responsibility in this case. It is really your personal problem. It is just you didn't keep your account safe.
Showing chat log here is going to prove that Riot was right to ban your account because of your abusive language
You have to show evidence that you didn't log onto your account which is to me, nearly impossible. And again, even if by somehow you could show some evidence, it is still your lesson to keep your account safe

To say it's his fault due to him not protecting his account is just retarded and proof of how shit this community actually is, you do realise Riot have been hacked and had sensitive information, such as account information stolen right?

Also, there are people constantly cracking accounts via methods such as bruteforce (it's not even hard to bypass login restrictions)

Yes, because hacking a no name bronze account is worth the time. Use your logic???. 

Coincidentally as the owner stop playing, this person just cracked his way toward the PW at that very moment and play for 5weeks on his account every days. USE YOUR HEAD, THIS GUY PROBLY HANDED OUT HIS INFO SO HIS FRIEND CAN PLAY.

When you crack accounts, you don't get a say in who's account or what type of accounts you're targeting, OP could have just had an easy password and username combination, you don't know, what if someone got his details from the database leak? you use your head thx

Sign you are soo clueless it not even funny. Owner goes on holiday for 5weeks and right away the "hacker" cracked onto his account and played straight off, everyday untill the ban? 

"OP could have just had an easy password and username combination"
Do you know anything about I.T? Do a little bit of reading into the basic of id/pw cracking using software. Then you will know how stupid you sound.

Leak from the database...That would mean this geniuse hacker would've have bypass all of riot line defence to even reach it. If soo then WOW what a feat. 

Oh am using my head, you're just clueless and speaks as such. He could've handed out his account to his TOxic friend to play while he taking the time off, or; He staged the whole show as his cover up, incase he got perma banned.

Thank you thats exactly my point if i had given my password away  I wouldnt even had bothered writing this report. i would of just made another one but that fact that I didnt get it banned is the real reason that pisses me off last time i ever had a punishment on my account was ages ago and it was 5 game afk leaver 20 minutes and that was because of my internet. So No one has really answered my questions on how do i report this. And my password for my account I personally don't think would be that easy to by pass but it probably was they did guess it because even 5 year olds know what it means and the real thing that disturbs me as how did they get my username and the password correct it would have to be one of the most fluke attempt or they are hacking either or.
Here is what i think is going on... this is actually you but you got toxic and got banned now you're trying to say it was a hacker so you get unbanned... its pretty cliche and pathetic tbh.

all the excuses from the 14 day bans


* The Sea cable makes me AFK and DC
* Someone stole my account, it wasnt a boost or account sharing i swear
* Riot didnt give me a chat restriction, they jumped over a fair punishment.
* KYS is actually banter, lighten up i was just joking.
* I was only abusive one game i swear


it just never ends with the excuses.
Let me get this straight... The 62 games you have played in last 7 days were not you??
